description: Storybook Creator is a program that allows you to design pages (SBPAGES in version 4 of the software) of a scrapbook, photo book, or wall calendar with text, photos, shapes, and other elements. You can then export the pages to be preserved digitally or printed and combined with other pages into a scrapbook, calendar, or another type of commemorative item.
NOTE: Creative Memories discontinued the development of Storybook Creator in 2014 as FOREVER acquired it and transformed it into Artisan software.
